byline.original: By STEPHEN CASTLE and STEVEN ERLANGER

lead_paragraph: Mr. Farage, the politician who probably did more than any other to force the referendum on British membership in the European Union, resigned on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Having Succeeded, Head of Party That Pushed Britain to Leave E.U. Resigns
headline.main: Nigel Farage, Who Spurred ‘Brexit,’ Resigns as Head of U.K. Independence Party

snippet: Mr. Farage, the politician who probably did more than any other to force the referendum on British membership in the European Union, resigned on Monday....
abstract: Nigel Farage, British politician who spent nearly 20 years pushing for Great Britain to leave European Union, resigns as leader of right-wing populist UK Independence Party.
